title: Item sets (Alpha Client)
body: So with my recent acquisition of the Alpha Client, I noticed that there is no Item Sets to be found, although I am able to see the sets I created prior to me getting into the alpha client, is this intended or will said feature be added in the future?

replies.body: You can still open the legacy client and you'll be able to use it until the alpha and open beta complete.
And what is Legacy client? How can I get it? All I know is that my old client was replaced with this Alpha client...

> [{quoted}](name=Aqamdax,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=TckquEmx,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-11-10T14:10:03.332+0000)
>
> And what is Legacy client? How can I get it? All I know is that my old client was replaced with this Alpha client...

The legacy client is the old client, also known as the AIR client.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot a huevo,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=TckquEmx,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-10T13:32:18.861+0000)
>
> You can still open the legacy client and you'll be able to use it until the alpha and open beta complete.

So we wont be able to use is once the new client is complete?

Until the alpha and open beta complete ? what happen if we need to update our item sets after that ?

Btw, I currently have a problem where i can update and use the new item set in-game started from the legacy client, but it used my previous one when i start a game in the alpha one.

HOW THE HELL COULD THEY HAVE REMOVED THIS!!! I LITERALLY HAD 5 TO 6 ITEM SETS CREATED FOR EVERY CHAMPION I OWN!! I OWN ALMOST ALL OF THEM. 
I CAN'T BELIEVE THIS?!?! WHO DO I COMEPLANE TO ?!?! I NEED THIS BACK. WHAT DO I DO NOW GO TO PEN AND PAPER??????

I have a problem with this. I need to change my item set, because of this recent patch that rolled in, but there is no item set to be found.
Yet, once I get to the game, the old item set is right there.. If only I could get to my old League client for just few minutes................

You should still have the legacy client, mine at least was not overridden by the alpha.. You should be able to go into your install folder (eg. C:\Riot Games\League of Legends ) and run lol.launcher.exe to open the legacy client. Just make sure the alpha is closed before you try.

Omg, I love you! I found it and managed to do some changes. :) You just made me a lot less annoyed on this Alpha client!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
